import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Flex, Stack, Text, Container, Box, Accordion, Radio, Group, Center, ColorInput, Slider, Input, Button, } from "@mantine/core"; import { IconCircleXFilled, IconAlignLeft, IconAlignCenter, IconAlignJustified, IconAlignRight, IconAdjustmentsHorizontal, IconBaselineDensityMedium, IconBaselineDensitySmall, } from "@tabler/icons-react"; const Drawer = () => { const [value, setValue] = useState(1); const handleChange = (newValue) => { setValue(newValue); }; const handleIncrement = () => { const newValue = value + 1; if (newValue <= 100) { setValue(newValue); } }; return ( Drawer Icon
Change Icon Background Icon Color Size Weight Back Button Radious Top Left Padding Left Margin Left ); }; export default Drawer;
